type: Maintenance and repair of marine installations
short_summary: Solicitation for repair of marine installations
description: This solicitation is for maintenance and repair of marine installations on the Lower North Shore in Quebec. The contract is open to all bidders. If two or more Indigenous Businesses submit responsive bids, non-Indigenous Business bids will be dismissed. Only Indigenous Business proposals will be evaluated. Suppliers can obtain a copy of the solicitation document at Ariba discovery website
full_summary:
## EE517-232263: Maintenance and Repair of Marine Installations
### Request for Standing Offers
#### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (DPGS) on behalf of Transport Canada is seeking Standing Offers for the maintenance and repair of marine installations on the Lower North Shore, Quebec.

#### Solicitation Details

|   Field   |   Value   |
|-----------|-----------|
| Solicitation Number     | WS4132703755 |
| Reference Number        | WS4132703755-Doc4134861980 |
| Amendment Number        | 1 |
| Publication Date         | August 7, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date     | August 31, 2023, at 2:00:00 PM |
| Expected Contract Start Date | September 1, 2023 |
| Expected Contract End Date | March 31, 2024 |
| Tender Status           | Expired |

#### Contract Details

* Procurement Category: Construction and Maintenance Services (CNST)
* Procurement Method: Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC))

#### Contact Information

* Julien Ratte, SPAC/PSPC
	+ Email: [julien.ratte](mailto:julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: Not Provided
	+ Fax: Not Provided
	+ Address: Not Provided

#### Additional Information

* This solicitation is open to all bidders; however, if two or more Indigenous Businesses submit responsive bids, non-Indigenous Business bids will be dismissed, and only Indigenous Business proposals will be evaluated.
* The Request for Standing Offers is available at the link below.
[[External Link]](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17093306?extsite=MTcwOTMzMDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

This is the rewritten entry. You provided with a good set of details, but some information was missing such as the UNSPSC code and the regions of opportunity. You also provided with multiple address for the contractor and notice submission. Both will require onward action to further complete.

Best regards, Yihwa Yan. 2023.07.24
